 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלַע‎</span>] **verb** ==sling, hurl forth== ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sit insecurely*** (see also [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>224</sup>, Socin in [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup>), ***waver***, whence <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sail*** (loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>l.c</sup>.), Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קַלְעָא‎</span> ***id.***, Biblical Hebrew Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶלַע‎</span> ***curtain***; thence ***hurl, sling***; but this perhaps denominative ([[BDB#So|Soc]]<sup>l.c</sup>.) from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***loosened clod***, compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.*** ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]] in [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>l.c</sup>.); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sling***, Eth <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְלַע‎</span> verb ***sling***, Syriac noun <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sling***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹלֵעַ בָּאֶבֶן אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Judg.20.16|Judg 20:16]] ***one slinging*** (***with***) ***a stone at*** a hair; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺ‎</span> with accusative of person [[Jer.10.18|Jer 10:18]] ***I will sling forth*** the inhabitants. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִקַלַּע‎</span> [[1Sam.17.49|1Sam 17:49]] ***and he slang*** (that is, the stone); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקַלְּעֶנָּה‎</span> [[1Sam.25.29|1Sam 25:29]] ***he shall sling away*** (life of enemy). 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלַע‎</span> **verb** ==carve==; — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span>: with 2 accusative, ***carve walls with***, [[1Kgs.6.29|1Kgs 6:29]] with accusative of congnate meaning with verb + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> v[[1Kgs.6.32|1Kgs 6:32]] with accusative of thing carved v[[1Kgs.6.35|1Kgs 6:35]].
